tool_description: Web Search API. Search the web pages from billions of results. Related keywords, knowledge panel and more.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search query. You can use web search parameters. e.g. `ronaldo site:instagram.com`, `twitter filetype:pdf`, `inurl:market`

optional_parameters.name: related_keywords
optional_parameters.description: Shows related keywords. Default: `false`. Entering `true` increases API latency.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Max results number. Max recommended value is `300`.
